lead_paragraph: EVANS--John C. The Board of Trustees and staff of Dia Art Foundation mourn the loss of John C. Evans and extend our deepest condolences to his family and friends. Evans served as a Trustee of Dia Art Foundation from 1985-2003 and was a Trustee Emeritus at the time of his passing. We will deeply miss Evans's counsel, generosity, and enthusiasm. Nathalie de Gunzburg, Chairman, and Jessica Morgan, Director, Dia Art Foundation 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  EVANS, JOHN C
